sentences.en: Checking all the names was a slow, laborious job.
sentences.cn: 核对全部名字是件既慢又费劲的事.

sentences.en: Even with high pressure oxygen pumping into her, breathing was laborious.
sentences.cn: 尽管输入高压氧,她的呼吸还是非常困难.

sentences.en: His anxious and laborious efforts were likely, at last, to be crowned with the happiest success.
sentences.cn: 他那番急切而辛苦的努力大概终于就要获得最愉快的成功了.

sentences.en: His books are written in a laborious style.
I didn't know that a both laborious and difficult road!
sentences.cn: 没想到,参加网界博览会是既辛苦又艰难的一条路!

sentences.en: Inventions and innovations almost always come out of laborious trial and error.
sentences.cn: 发明及创新几乎都是艰苦的试验和失败的产物.

sentences.en: Keeping the garden tidy all year round can be a laborious task.
sentences.cn: 一年到头把花园拾掇得干净整洁也不是件轻松活儿。

sentences.en: The computation of approximate solutions was an extremely laborious task.
sentences.cn: 近似解的计算是极其繁重的工作.

sentences.en: The distance seemed interminable, and the walk was most laborious.
sentences.cn: 距离好象无穷无尽似的, 走起来真够吃力.

sentences.en: the laborious business of drying the crops
sentences.cn: 把收获的庄稼晒干这一艰苦的工作

sentences.en: Their installation proved a laborious undertaking.
sentences.cn: 要来安顿这些人,确实是一件麻烦的事情.

sentences.en: They had the laborious task of cutting down the huge tree.
sentences.cn: 他们接受了伐大树的艰苦工作.

sentences.en: They were laborious, but he relished this kind of work.
sentences.cn: 这些计算是很繁重的工作, 但是亚当斯对这种工作甘之如饴.

sentences.en: We should not despise plain features, nor a laborious yet honest occupation.
sentences.cn: 我们不应该看不起相貌平常的人, 也不应该看不起辛苦而正直的职业.

sentences.en: You may have the impression that this process is usually laborious.
sentences.cn: 你可能认为这种方法是艰难的.

words.tran_cn: 吃力的；费劲的；不自然的
辛苦地；费力地；不流畅地
工作；劳动；分娩（labor的过去分词）
劳动；努力；为…所苦恼；艰难地行进（labour的ing形式）

trans.tran_en: taking a lot of time and effort
